A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's the perfect movie for a parent to take a child to\, creating a new generation of fans. Older nerds like me wont care for it. The family friendly humor seemed forced throughout the movie\, it's like they ignored all character development from 4 5 6 and I found myself not giving a crap about all the characters save one (the chick) and that was only so... it would have been better if they made a whole new story that was based on the history of the old ones\, that way I probably won't be as critical. I love Star Wars and was disappointed.
